home.title: Hi, I'm Juan Daniel
home.subtitle: Frontend Developer
home.description: I create modern and responsive web applications with React, Next.js, and TypeScript

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know me better
about.description: I'm a passionate frontend developer with experience in building dynamic web applications. I love creating intuitive user interfaces and solving complex problems with clean, efficient code.
about.experienceReactNative: Known for enhancing user experience on digital platforms, including mobile solutions with React Native.
about.experienceAgile: Familiar with agile methodologies like SCRUM, design tools like Figma, and web accessibility principles.
about.experienceLearning: Committed to continuous learning and constantly improving the user experience.

resumeContent.about: Front-End Developer with experience in creating responsive and scalable interfaces using technologies like React, Next.js, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Known for enhancing user experience on digital platforms, including mobile solutions with React Native. Familiar with agile methodologies like SCRUM, design tools like Figma, and web accessibility principles. Committed to continuous learning and constantly improving the user experience.

highlights: Development of scalable and optimized interfaces with Next.js for e-learning platforms.
Integration of components and functionalities in collaboration with external teams, ensuring visual and technical coherence.
Continuous optimization of security, design, and user experience.
Development of mobile applications using React Native to improve cross-platform accessibility.
Efficient connection and integration of APIs and middlewares.
Process automation through scripts to improve interaction with digital courses.
Creation of interactive courses in Storyline to improve learning effectiveness.
Implementation of advanced JavaScript functions to customize user experiences.
Development of augmented reality applications with Unity focused on mobile devices.
Design and programming of virtual reality experiences for Oculus Quest 2.
Production of educational video games using GDevelop and integration with e-learning platforms.
Design and development of multimedia content
Creation of APIs and RESTful services
Data CRUD with FastAPI and SQLAlchemy

items.title: SCORM Development for Adalid
items.description: Freelance work for Adalid where multiple SCORM modules were programmed with Articulate Storyline following a defined graphic line.
highlights: Creation of interactive activities and assessments

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Check out some of my recent work

evoluxion.title: Evoluxión
evoluxion.description: A comprehensive e-learning platform for professional development courses.

home.description: Responsive home page featuring a device-adaptive banner and a personalized list of in-progress courses. A course list to enrolled courses and recommended content based on the user's role.
home.alt: Evoluxión home page with course dashboard

login.description: Interactive login page with image carousel and NextAuth integration offering multiple authentication methods including traditional credentials and Google sign-in.

course.description: Course detail page displaying comprehensive information, trailer/banner, enrollment button, user reviews, and ratings. Content visibility is dynamically adjusted based on user roles.
course.alt: Course detail page with information and reviews

lesson.description: Interactive lesson view with sidebar navigation showing course structure, lesson resources, and main content area. Supports multiple content formats including SCORM modules, videos, PDFs, and interactive infographics.
lesson.alt: Lesson page with sidebar navigation and content

superChachos.title: Super Chachos del Motor
superChachos.description: An automotive training platform for mechanics and car enthusiasts.

login.description: Comprehensive login page with user authentication form, new user registration, password recovery, and terms and conditions acceptance features.
login.alt: Super Chachos del Motor login page

home.description: Responsive home page with adaptive banner and course cards organized by user progress, providing easy access to ongoing learning pathways.
home.alt: Super Chachos dashboard with progress-based courses

catalog.description: Course catalog with tabbed navigation organized by progress status, featuring course cards and a dynamic course counter to track available learning options.
catalog.alt: Organized course catalog with progress tabs

progress.description: Interactive course view displaying the current SCORM lesson with navigation to access other course lessons, supporting a seamless learning experience.
progress.alt: SCORM lesson view with course navigation

cintia.title: CintIA
cintia.description: An AI-powered chatbot platform for customer service automation.

access.description: Access restriction page that prevents unauthorized entry, displaying CintIA's branding and informing users about which platforms they can use to access the chatbot's services.

chat.description: Initial conversation interface with topic selection buttons allowing users to choose specific conversation themes or inquiries for more focused assistance.

active.description: Active conversation view showing message bubbles from both the chatbot and user with timestamps, read status indicators, and utility rating buttons to evaluate response helpfulness.

search.description: Search functionality highlighting matched terms within previous conversations with a count indicator, enabling users to quickly locate relevant information from past interactions.
search.alt: CintIA chatbot message search with highlighted results

emprendedores.title: Emprendedores Bavaria
emprendedores.description: A business development platform for entrepreneurs.

login.description: Secure authentication interface with username and password access, featuring Bavaria's branding and a streamlined design optimized for mobile devices.

home.description: Dynamic home screen with API-driven banner content and course cards categorized by progress. Implements a prerequisite system that provides feedback when course access conditions aren't met.
home.alt: Dynamic home screen with course progress

catalog.description: Course catalog displaying available courses with visual progress indicators and prerequisite status, helping users understand their learning path requirements.

profile.description: User profile interface displaying personal information, profile picture, and earned achievement badges based on completed learning milestones and course completions.

analysis.description: Analytics dashboard featuring donut charts visualizing time spent per course and percentage completion metrics, giving users insights into their learning progress.

uxplora.title: Uxplora
uxplora.description: A UX design learning platform with interactive courses.

home.description: Interactive home page featuring a dynamic news carousel with custom usability functions and design elements implemented according to approved Figma prototypes.

study.description: Study plan detail view with progressive unlocking system that enables access to courses, resources, and assessments as users advance through each step of their learning journey.

marketplace.description: Course marketplace with comprehensive filtering system allowing users to easily discover available courses based on multiple criteria and preferences.

hobbies.title: My Hobbies
hobbies.subtitle: What I enjoy in my free time
hobbies.description: These creative pursuits have helped me develop a strong eye for design, attention to detail, and the ability to think in multiple dimensions - skills that directly benefit my front-end development work.

illustrations.title: Illustrations
illustrations.description: Digital illustrations created with Photoshop and Illustrator

3dmodeling.title: 3D Modeling & Animation
3dmodeling.description: 3D models, texturing, rigging and animations created with Maya, Blender, and Mudbox

2danimation.title: 2D Animation
2danimation.description: Frame-by-frame animations created with Toon Boom, Krita and traditional drawing

motiongraphics.title: Motion Graphics
motiongraphics.description: Motion graphics and visual effects created with After Effects
